ac.msg: ACs use a lot of energy!
Make sure to close all windows if the AC is on!
Make sure to turn off the AC when you leave the house!
Using fans with the AC can help cool the house better!

dryer.msg: Drying machines use a lot of energy!
Using low heat will use less energy.
Drying your clothes out in the sun does not use any electricity!

ceiling-fan.msg: Fans use much less electricity than AC.
It is better to open the windows when you are using fans.

refrigerator.msg: Refrigerators are always on to keep your food cold.
Try not to leave the refrigerator open for long.

light.msg: LED lights can last for a long time.
Turn off the light when you leave the room to save energy!

oven.msg: Electric ovens need a lot of energy.
Ovens can be HOT. Do not use the oven without an adult around!
Cooking on the stove uses less energy than cooking in the oven.

porch-light.msg: Motion-activated porch lights can save energy.
Solar-powered porch lights are a great option to save energy!

solar-panel.msg: Solar panels turn sunlight into energy.
Solar panels work the best when it is sunny!

tv.msg: Old CRT TVs use more energy than new LED TVs.
Turn off the TV when you are not watching to save energy!
Smaller TVs use less energy than bigger TVs.

washer.msg: Washing clothes with hot water uses more energy.

idle.msg: Turn on an appliance to see how much electricity it uses!
You can tap the screen or use the switch!
